A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So so fantasy/Sci Fi film.  Not so bad as stand alone film\, rubbish as Star Wars story. Massive plot holes\, characters not acting consistently from earlier films\, unnecessary SJW politics. Attempted humour unfunny and out of place. Poor plot\, no continuation from eth Force Awakens (had the dircetor even watched the film?). Only good thing was visuals and music\, however those alone do not make a film. I have no interest in characters and have no intention to pay to see anymore sequels. Avoid.
